backend/main.mo: Defines studio data types, currency comparison logic, income records, podcasts, events, and reporting structures for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Specifies feature evidence mappings linking feature IDs to affected frontend files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries for various frontend source files used for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables and light/dark mode CSS properties.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication gating, profile setup, and all application routes within a themed provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an error screen for unauthorized users with navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Logout button clearing Internet Identity state, query cache, and role-related session storage values.
frontend/src/components/auth/PostLoginRo: Handles post-login role claiming by reading pending requests, attempting the claim, and processing success or error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that lets a user enter their name and saves the profile using a mutation with success and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Wrapper that checks the caller's role and either renders children, a loading spinner, or an access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Application layout with navigation, main content area, and a footer containing studio info and social links.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing links based on user role, login status, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, income records, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base, components, utilities, and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/RoleManagementP: Provides a form for admins to assign user roles by principal ID with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the Internet Identity login screen with studio feature previews and handles role claim error display.
frontend/src/pages/reception/IntakeCompl: Shows a completion confirmation after a visit is registered and offers navigation to start a new visit or view all visits.
frontend/src/pages/reception/ReceptionVi: Contains the full visit intake form with validation, podcast guest logic, and submission to create income records.
Displays all visit records with service icons, admin-only clear-history functionality, and navigation to visit details.
frontend/src/pages/reception/VisitDetail: Shows detailed information for a single visit including client data, payment status, service icons, and navigation back.
frontend/src/pages/reports/MonthlyReport: Renders monthly report charts and selectors for year, month, and currency using fetched analytics data.
frontend/src/pages/services/PhotoVideoDe: Displays and edits photo/video session details for a visit, with form validation and navigation on submit.
frontend/src/pages/services/PodcastDetai: Manages podcast session details including dynamic guest list editing and saving via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/services/RecordingDet: Provides a form to view and edit recording session details for a visit with basic validation.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Defines supported currencies and helpers for formatting, labeling, and totaling monetary amounts.
frontend/src/utils/pendingRoleRequest.ts: Handles storing, retrieving, and clearing pending role requests and role claim errors in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/phone.ts: Provides helpers for prefilling and displaying phone number formats with a default country code.
frontend/src/utils/roleLabels.ts: Maps user roles to display labels and manages storing the selected label in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing parameters from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, including existing features, a new feature request, and metadata for a project removing post-login role selection.
